author: cswimr
Eternalll
install_msg:
**__Anyone__ with bot administrator role set in `[p]set` can create backups! You should use the official version of backup if this is not intended!**.
Thank you for installing Backup!
You can find the source code of this cog [here](https://c.csw.im/cswimr/SeaCogs).
name: Backup
short: A utility to make reinstalling repositories and cogs after migrating the bot far easier.
description: Fork of backup that lowers permission requirement for backups to Administrator. A utility to make reinstalling repositories and cogs after migrating the bot far easier.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
